title: Nikolaos Fexis
text: Nikolaos Fexis (born 1906, date of death unknown) was a Greek <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>.
